author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

This PR extends the `GEMPadDigiClusterProducer` with a function `convertCluster` , which calculates a clusters' theta and phi position based off the eta partition and pad number. This functionality will be offloaded from the EMTF onto the GEM optohybrids. The code was taken from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/L1Trigger/L1TMuonEndCap/src/PrimitiveConversion.cc#L841-L876. 

The new cluster collection is given the label "Converted" 
```
edmEventSize -a -v step2.root | grep GEMPadDigiCluster
GEMDetIdGEMPadDigiClusterMuonDigiCollection_simMuonGEMPadDigiClusters__HLT. 399.2 334.7
GEMDetIdGEMPadDigiClusterMuonDigiCollection_simMuonGEMPadDigiClusters_Converted_HLT. 335.6 318.3
```

Future improvements may include: 1) using LUTs instead of the CMS geometry interface 2) allowing for alignment corrections.

Additionally, this PR consolidates all GEM trigger primitive producers from `L1Trigger/ME0Trigger` and `L1Trigger/L1TGEM` into a single package (`L1TGEM`). This is necessary to absorb the ME0 system into the GEM system later on. 

#### PR validation:

I tested it with WF 22034.0
